verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֖ית <S%H7225><s%> In the beginning בָּרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> created אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heaven וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the earth הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was תֹ֙הוּ֙ <S%H8414><s%> without form וָבֹ֔הוּ <S%H922><s%> and void וְחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> and darkness עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [was] upon the face תְה֑וֹם <S%H8415><s%> of the deep וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God מְרַחֶ֖פֶת <S%H7363><s%> moved עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the face הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> of the waters
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God יְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> Let there be א֑וֹר <S%H216><s%> light וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> and there was light

וַיַּ֧רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [it was] good וַיַּבְדֵּ֣ל <S%H914><s%> separated אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and God בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> from הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> from הַחֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> the darkness

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God לָאוֹר֙ <S%H216><s%> the light י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Day וְלַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> and the darkness קָ֣רָא <S%H7121><s%> he called לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Night וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> were the first פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> Let there be רָקִ֖יעַ <S%H7549><s%> Let there be a firmament בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the waters וִיהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become מַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> and let it divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters לָמָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> from the waters

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made אֱלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָקִיעַ֒ <S%H7549><s%> the firmament וַיַּבְדֵּ֗ל <S%H914><s%> and divided בֵּ֤ין <S%H996><s%> among הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the waters אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which מִתַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> [were] under לָרָקִ֔יעַ <S%H7549><s%> the firmament וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> from הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> from the waters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> [were] above לָרָקִ֑יעַ <S%H7549><s%> the firmament וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> and it was so

וַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> called אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God לָֽרָקִ֖יעַ <S%H7549><s%> the firmament שָׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> Heaven וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day שֵׁנִֽי׃ <S%H8145><s%> were the second פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> And God יִקָּו֨וּ <S%H6960><s%> be gathered together הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> Let the waters מִתַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> under the heaven אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto מָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> one וְתֵרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> [land] appear הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> and let the dry וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> And God לַיַּבָּשָׁה֙ <S%H3004><s%> the dry אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [land] Earth וּלְמִקְוֵ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> and the gathering together הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the waters קָרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called יַמִּ֑ים <S%H3220><s%> he Seas וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> that [it was] good

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> And God תַּֽדְשֵׁ֤א <S%H1876><s%> bring forth הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> Let the earth דֶּ֔שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> grass עֵ֚שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> the herb מַזְרִ֣יעַ <S%H2232><s%> yielding זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree פְּרִ֞י <S%H6529><s%> [and] the fruit עֹ֤שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> yielding פְּרִי֙ <S%H6529><s%> fruit לְמִינ֔וֹ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose זַרְעוֹ־ <S%H2233><s%> seed ב֖וֹ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [is] in itself upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַתּוֹצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> brought forth הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the earth דֶּ֠שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> grass עֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> [and] herb מַזְרִ֤יעַ <S%H2232><s%> yielding זֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> seed לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וְעֵ֧ץ <S%H6086><s%> and the tree עֹֽשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> yielding פְּרִ֛י <S%H6529><s%> fruit אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> with זַרְעוֹ־ <S%H2233><s%> whose seed ב֖וֹ לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> [was] in itself after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> that [it was] good

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day שְׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> were the third פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> And God יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become מְאֹרֹת֙ <S%H3974><s%> Let there be lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven לְהַבְדִּ֕יל <S%H914><s%> to divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> from הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> from the night וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> them be for לְאֹתֹת֙ <S%H226><s%> and let them be for signs וּלְמ֣וֹעֲדִ֔ים <S%H4150><s%> and for seasons וּלְיָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> and for days וְשָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> and years

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> them be for לִמְאוֹרֹת֙ <S%H3974><s%> And let them be for lights בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> in the firmament הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <S%H215><s%> to give light עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two הַמְּאֹרֹ֖ת <S%H3974><s%> lights הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> great אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּא֤וֹר <S%H3974><s%> light הַגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> the greater לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> to rule הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמָּא֤וֹר <S%H3974><s%> light הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> and the lesser לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> to rule הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> the night וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַכּוֹכָבִֽים׃ <S%H3556><s%> [he made] the stars

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> set אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God בִּרְקִ֣יעַ <S%H7549><s%> them in the firmament הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven לְהָאִ֖יר <S%H215><s%> to give light עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

וְלִמְשֹׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> And to rule בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> over the day וּבַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and over the night וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <S%H914><s%> and to divide בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among הָא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> the light וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> from הַחֹ֑שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> from the darkness וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> that [it was] good

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day רְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> were the fourth פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God יִשְׁרְצ֣וּ <S%H8317><s%> bring forth abundantly הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Let the waters שֶׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> the moving creature נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> that hath חַיָּ֑ה <S%H2416><s%> life וְעוֹף֙ <S%H5775><s%> and fowl יְעוֹפֵ֣ף <S%H5774><s%> [that] may fly עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> in the open רְקִ֥יעַ <S%H7549><s%> firmament הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וַיִּבְרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> created אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתַּנִּינִ֖ם <S%H8577><s%> whales הַגְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> great וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> creature הַֽחַיָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2416><s%> and every living הָֽרֹמֶ֡שֶׂת <S%H7430><s%> that moveth אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁרְצ֨וּ <S%H8317><s%> brought forth abundantly הַמַּ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> which the waters לְמִֽינֵהֶ֗ם <S%H4327><s%> after their kind וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every ע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> fowl כָּנָף֙ <S%H3671><s%> and every winged לְמִינֵ֔הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> that [it was] good

וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> And God לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> them saying פְּר֣וּ <S%H6509><s%> Be fruitful וּרְב֗וּ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וּמִלְא֤וּ <S%H4390><s%> and fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the waters בַּיַּמִּ֔ים <S%H3220><s%> in the seas וְהָע֖וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and let fowl יִ֥רֶב <S%H7235><s%> multiply בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day חֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> were the fifth פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> And God תּוֹצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> bring forth הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Let the earth נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> creature חַיָּה֙ <S%H2416><s%> the living לְמִינָ֔הּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind בְּהֵמָ֥ה <S%H929><s%> cattle וָרֶ֛מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and creeping thing וְחַֽיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> and beast אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְמִינָ֑הּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made אֱלֹהִים֩ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיַּ֨ת <S%H2416><s%> the beast הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְמִינָ֗הּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> and cattle לְמִינָ֔הּ <S%H4327><s%> after their kind וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everything רֶ֥מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and every thing that creepeth הָֽאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> upon the earth לְמִינֵ֑הוּ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it was טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> that [it was] good

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> And God נַֽעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> Let us make אָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> man בְּצַלְמֵ֖נוּ <S%H6754><s%> in our image כִּדְמוּתֵ֑נוּ <S%H1823><s%> after our likeness וְיִרְדּוּ֩ <S%H7287><s%> and let them have dominion בִדְגַ֨ת <S%H1710><s%> over the fish הַיָּ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וּבְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and over the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וּבַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> and over the cattle וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and over all the earth וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָרֶ֖מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> and over every creeping thing הָֽרֹמֵ֥שׂ <S%H7430><s%> that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

וַיִּבְרָ֨א <S%H1254><s%> created אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> So God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> man בְּצַלְמ֔וֹ <S%H6754><s%> in his [own] image בְּצֶ֥לֶם <S%H6754><s%> in the image אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> created אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> זָכָ֥ר <S%H2145><s%> he him male וּנְקֵבָ֖ה <S%H5347><s%> and female בָּרָ֥א <S%H1254><s%> created אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֹתָם֮ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִים֒ <S%H430><s%> And God וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֜ם אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> them and God פְּר֥וּ <S%H6509><s%> unto them Be fruitful וּרְב֛וּ <S%H7235><s%> and multiply וּמִלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> and replenish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְכִבְשֻׁ֑הָ <S%H3533><s%> and subdue it וּרְד֞וּ <S%H7287><s%> and have dominion בִּדְגַ֤ת <S%H1710><s%> over the fish הַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וּבְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and over the fowl הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> and over every living thing הָֽרֹמֶ֥שֶׂת <S%H7430><s%> that moveth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> And God הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָתַ֨תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have given לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣שֶׂב ׀ <S%H6212><s%> you every herb זֹרֵ֣עַ <S%H2232><s%> bearing זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] upon the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הָעֵ֛ץ <S%H6086><s%> and every tree אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בּ֥וֹ פְרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> in the which [is] the fruit עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> of a tree זֹרֵ֣עַ <S%H2232><s%> yielding זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed לָכֶ֥ם יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> to you it shall be לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> for meat

וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> And to every beast הָ֠אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every ע֨וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and to every fowl הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> every רוֹמֵ֣שׂ <S%H7430><s%> and to every thing that creepeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בּוֹ֙ נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any חַיָּ֔ה <S%H2416><s%> age אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> thing יֶ֥רֶק <S%H3418><s%> [I have given] every green עֵ֖שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> herb לְאָכְלָ֑ה <S%H402><s%> for meat וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and it was כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> And God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> every thing that עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> he had made וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and behold [it was] very וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was עֶ֥רֶב <S%H6153><s%> And the evening וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and there was בֹ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> and the morning י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשִּׁשִּֽׁי׃ <S%H8345><s%> were the sixth פ
